sn22.87:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati veluvane kalandakanivape.
sn22.87:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma vakkali kumbhakaranivesane viharati abadhiko dukkhito balhagilano.
sn22.87:1.3: Atha kho ayasma vakkali upatthake amantesi:
sn22.87:1.4: “etha tumhe, avuso, yena bhagava tenupasankamatha; upasankamitva mama vacanena bhagavato pade sirasa vandatha:
sn22.87:1.5: ‘vakkali, bhante, bhikkhu abadhiko dukkhito balhagilano, so bhagavato pade sirasa vandati’ti.
sn22.87:1.7: ‘sadhu kira, bhante, bhagava yena vakkali bhikkhu tenupasankamatu anukampam upadaya’”ti.
sn22.87:1.8: “Evamavuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato vakkalissa patissutva yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho te bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavocum:
sn22.87:1.9: “vakkali, bhante, bhikkhu abadhiko dukkhito balhagilano, so bhagavato pade sirasa vandati;
sn22.87:1.11: ‘sadhu kira, bhante, bhagava yena vakkali bhikkhu tenupasankamatu anukampam upadaya’”ti.
sn22.87:2.1: Atha kho bhagava nivasetva pattacivaramadaya yenayasma vakkali tenupasankami.
sn22.87:2.2: Addasa kho ayasma vakkali bhagavantam duratova agacchantam. Disvana mancake samadhosi.
sn22.87:2.3: Atha kho bhagava ayasmantam vakkalim etadavoca:
sn22.87:2.6: Nisidi bhagava pannatte asane. Nisajja kho bhagava ayasmantam vakkalim etadavoca:
sn22.87:2.7: “kacci te, vakkali, khamaniyam, kacci yapaniyam, kacci dukkha vedana patikkamanti, no abhikkamanti; patikkamosanam pannayati, no abhikkamo”ti?
sn22.87:2.8: “Na me, bhante, khamaniyam, na yapaniyam; balha me dukkha vedana abhikkamanti, no patikkamanti; abhikkamosanam pannayati, no patikkamo”ti.
sn22.87:2.9: “Kacci te, vakkali, na kinci kukkuccam, na koci vippatisaro”ti?
sn22.87:2.10: “Taggha me, bhante, anappakam kukkuccam, anappako vippatisaro”ti.
sn22.87:2.11: “Kacci pana tam, vakkali, atta silato na upavadati”ti?
sn22.87:2.12: “Na kho mam, bhante, atta silato upavadati”ti.
sn22.87:2.13: “No ce kira tam, vakkali, atta silato upavadati; atha kinca te kukkuccam ko ca vippatisaro”ti?
sn22.87:2.14: “Cirapatikaham, bhante, bhagavantam dassanaya upasankamitukamo, natthi ca me kayasmim tavatika balamatta, yavataham bhagavantam dassanaya upasankameyyan”ti.
sn22.87:3.1: “Alam, vakkali, kim te imina putikayena ditthena?
sn22.87:3.2: Yo kho, vakkali, dhammam passati so mam passati;
sn22.87:3.3: yo mam passati so dhammam passati.
sn22.87:4.4: “Yam pananiccam dukkham va tam sukham va”ti?
sn22.87:4.6: “Yam pananiccam dukkham viparinamadhammam, kallam nu tam samanupassitum:
sn22.87:5.1: Atha kho bhagava ayasmantam vakkalim imina ovadena ovaditva utthayasana yena gijjhakuto pabbato tena pakkami.
sn22.87:5.2: Atha kho ayasma vakkali acirapakkantassa bhagavato upatthake amantesi:
sn22.87:5.3: “etha mam, avuso, mancakam aropetva yena isigilipassam kalasila tenupasankamatha.
sn22.87:5.4: Kathanhi nama madiso antaraghare kalam kattabbam manneyya”ti?
sn22.87:5.5: “Evamavuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato vakkalissa patissutva ayasmantam vakkalim mancakam aropetva yena isigilipassam kalasila tenupasankamimsu.
sn22.87:5.6: Atha kho bhagava tanca rattim tanca divavasesam gijjhakute pabbate vihasi.
sn22.87:5.7: Atha kho dve devatayo abhikkantaya rattiya abhikkantavanna kevalakappam gijjhakutam obhasetva yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu …pe… ekamantam atthamsu.
sn22.87:5.8: Ekamantam thita kho eka devata bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn22.87:5.13: Idam vatva bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva tatthevantaradhayimsu.
sn22.87:6.1: Atha kho bhagava tassa rattiya accayena bhikkhu amantesi:
sn22.87:6.2: “etha tumhe, bhikkhave, yena vakkali bhikkhu tenupasankamatha; upasankamitva vakkalim bhikkhum evam vadetha:
sn22.87:7.1: ‘Sunavuso tvam, vakkali, bhagavato vacanam dvinnanca devatanam.
sn22.87:7.2: Imam, avuso, rattim dve devatayo abhikkantaya rattiya abhikkantavanna kevalakappam gijjhakutam obhasetva yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam atthamsu.
sn22.87:7.3: Ekamantam thita kho, avuso, eka devata bhagavantam etadavoca—
sn22.87:7.6: so hi nuna, bhante, suvimutto vimuccissatiti.
sn22.87:7.7: Bhagava ca tam, avuso vakkali, evamaha—
sn22.87:7.10: Apapakam te maranam bhavissati, apapika kalakiriya’”ti.
sn22.87:7.11: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato patissutva yenayasma vakkali tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva ayasmantam vakkalim etadavocum:
sn22.87:8.1: Atha kho ayasma vakkali upatthake amantesi:
sn22.87:8.3: Kathanhi nama madiso ucce asane nisiditva tassa bhagavato sasanam sotabbam manneyya”ti.
sn22.87:8.4: “Evamavuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato vakkalissa patissutva ayasmantam vakkalim mancaka oropesum.
sn22.87:8.5: “Imam, avuso, rattim dve devatayo abhikkantaya rattiya …pe… ekamantam atthamsu.
sn22.87:8.6: Ekamantam thita kho, avuso, eka devata bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn22.87:8.10: Bhagava ca tam, avuso vakkali, evamaha:
sn22.87:8.13: Apapakam te maranam bhavissati, apapika kalakiriya’”ti.
sn22.87:8.14: “Tena havuso, mama vacanena bhagavato pade sirasa vandatha:
sn22.87:8.21: Yadaniccam dukkham viparinamadhammam, natthi me tattha chando va rago va pemam vati na vicikicchami.
sn22.87:8.25: Yadaniccam dukkham viparinamadhammam, natthi me tattha chando va rago va pemam vati na vicikicchami.
sn22.87:8.30: Yadaniccam dukkham viparinamadhammam, natthi me tattha chando va rago va pemam vati na vicikicchami.
sn22.87:8.34: Yadaniccam dukkham viparinamadhammam, natthi me tattha chando va rago va pemam vati na vicikicchami’”ti.
sn22.87:8.35: “Evamavuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato vakkalissa patissutva pakkamimsu.
sn22.87:8.36: Atha kho ayasma vakkali acirapakkantesu tesu bhikkhusu sattham aharesi.
sn22.87:9.1: Atha kho te bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho te bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavocum:
sn22.87:9.8: Yadaniccam dukkham viparinamadhammam, natthi me tattha chando va rago va pemam vati na vicikicchami.
sn22.87:9.15: Yadaniccam dukkham viparinamadhammam, natthi me tattha chando va rago va pemam vati na vicikicchami’”ti.
sn22.87:10.4: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosum.
sn22.87:10.5: Atha kho bhagava sambahulehi bhikkhuhi saddhim yena isigilipassam kalasila tenupasankami.
sn22.87:10.6: Addasa kho bhagava ayasmantam vakkalim duratova mancake vivattakkhandham semanam.
sn22.87:11.1: Tena kho pana samayena dhumayitattam timirayitattam gacchateva purimam disam, gacchati pacchimam disam, gacchati uttaram disam, gacchati dakkhinam disam, gacchati uddham disam, gacchati adho disam, gacchati anudisam.
sn22.87:11.3: “passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, etam dhumayitattam timirayitattam gacchateva purimam disam …pe… gacchati anudisan”ti.
sn22.87:11.5: “Eso kho, bhikkhave, maro papima vakkalissa kulaputtassa vinnanam samanvesati:
sn22.87:11.7: Appatitthitena ca, bhikkhave, vinnanena vakkali kulaputto parinibbuto”ti.
